comments.body: Wait, what do you mean? And is this a TS bug too?

@DanielRosenwasser Thanks for the feedback. I don't hurry up :). This comment form the original test which handles `unknown` in TypeScript https://github.com/microsoft/TypeScript/blob/4c62f6e7d62188d8fecb92300c72d1435924cb64/tests/cases/conformance/statements/tryStatements/catchClauseWithTypeAnnotation.ts#L28-L31
